items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and flattering sweater option
items.body: This short sleeve sweater is super cute! Besides being cute, this sweater fits great and true to size. I am a size small, ordered a Small and it fits perfectly. This is an item you can wear anywhere. Wear it to work or casually. Wear with a jacket or by itself. Wear it with jeans, slacks, or a skirt. The scalloped edges add a nice feminine touch. The v neck is nice and it looks super cute with a simple necklace. The sweater has a nice weight and thickness to it. It feels like a quality knit sweater. There are no holes in the knit, which I like. Some knit sweaters are knitted too loose and then they allow airflow which makes them not very warm. This sweater is actually knit pretty tightly. The material is super soft, not at all scratchy, made from 100% Viscose. With it being Viscose, I would recommend treating is a little better when washing. I would wash it in cold and line dry. Read more
items.author: Brig

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite year-round top
items.body: I ordered this in gray with flowers and it is sublime! The scallop neck, sleeves and hem, along with the white trim are beautiful and unique. The gray is a soft color, as is the material. (It's VERY comfortable.) The white flowers with brown centers are cute without being childish. The colors are neutral enough to pair with any color bottom. I especially appreciate the strategic placement of the flowers, as they were not centered in such a way as to look like breasts on the shirt.) The comfort is superb. It's lightweight without being thin or transparent. Yet it could easily be paired with a cute jacket for cooler temps. As for the shape, I know some reviews have noted it was boxy or long. I'm tall and curvy and didn't feel like it was boxy on me at all. Rather, it was very flattering to my shape. Not so tight or low cut as to be inappropriate, nor so loose and high cut as to be prudish. Literally, perfect for me. (The hub liked it a lot too! ;) ) Read more
items.author: Christy Nunez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, Well-made Sweater Top But Not for My Figure Type
items.body: The Zeagoo Women's Short Sleeve Sweater looked like an unique, interesting top that might be perfect to mix and match with items already in my eclectic wardrobe; so I ordered one in a medium size and the "hot pink" color. The sweater top arrived quickly, minimally packaged in a vacuum-sealed plastic bag and box. Upon opening the bag, the top expanded. The v-neck sweater was of a beautiful, warm, clean magenta color with cute scalloped white trim on the neckline, sleeves and hem that gave it a hand-crafted appearance. The viscose fabric felt soft to the touch and of a good thickness--not thin but not too heavy, either. Based on my first impression, I was anticipating a soft, flowing, breathable boho-type top for spring, summer and fall use. Unfortunately, when I tried on the sweater, my hopes were dashed. The color was perfect for my "autumn/spring" complexion, but the fit and length of the medium-sized top were way off for my figure type. For reference, I am 5'9-1/2" tall, 130 pounds, with a 38-inch chest and an athletic build; so I usually wear a medium tall size. And the fabric, while soft and airy, was slightly scratchy to my sensitive skin. On me, the pretty top looked frumpy, not boho. The length was unexpectly long, which usually would have been a plus, but the waist area was baggy while the hem line was oddly tight. Sadly, the top did not flow over my leggings, and it looked and felt odd tucked into a skirt. Maybe a smaller size would have fit me better in this generously-sized sweater. I recommend Zeagoo Women's Short Sleeve Sweater with reservations. The lovely, versatile, well-made, high-quality blouse was not, unfortunately, for my athletic-figure type; but it might work for you if you prefer oversized as opposed to form-fitting tops or if you like more traditional-type as compared to cutting edge styles. If it fits you well, then it could be a good value for the cost. Just be aware that the viscose fabric is best treated with care, such as gentle washing and line drying. Read more
items.author: Casicatz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soooo soft!
items.body: This shirt is super soft and I was very surprised at that! I also love that the pattern is on the back of the top. (As you can see in the picture. Please ignore all the hidden Christmas present clutter ðŸ¤¦) A lot of times when you get something like this the pattern is only on the front and that drives me crazy. The sweater is light weight as advertised and is well made! I love the scalloped edges. Super cute! Read more
items.author: MO

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater.
items.body: This sweater is perfect for spring and summer. It is made of a very soft and stretchy material that is thinner than your typical sweater. The sweater runs true to size, and the color is great. The scallop edges along the sleeves, the neck, and the hem add a lot. This sweater runs true to size and is very flattering. It would grow great with a skirt or slacks or shorts depending on the event. This sweater is great quality. This sweater is a great value. I highly recommend this sweater. It will make a great addition to any wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Abby E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Shirt is very flattering. And there is a liner so your bra won't show. Read more
items.author: Rebecca G

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute short sleeved sweater
items.body: For reference, I ordered a size SMALL. I typically wear between a S-M, depending on the type and/or fit of the top. I was surprised that this was a little bit loose on me in the waist/tummy area. Personally, I think I would have preferred a slightly tighter fit, but that's just me. Otherwise, it's true to size. The sweater is soft, has a cute design, and appears to be of good quality as it has some weight to it. It works well dressed up or casual. Read more
items.author: Nadine J.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!
items.body: This top is so cute and the material is soft! Read more
items.author: Cammy Burningham

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-white Red Heart, Brown, A-red White Heart, Apricot, Hot Pink, Black, A-flower Grey, A-grey&khaki, White, A-khaki Bow, A-khaki Polka Dot, Dark Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
